mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (orders_no, member_no, gpurchase_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, qty, message, postcode, status) VALUES (#{ordersNo}, #{memberNo}, #{gpurchaseNo}, sysdate, #{price}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{qty}, #{message}, #{postcode}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT orders_no, member_no, gpurchase_no, odate, price, address, receiver, phone, qty, message, postcode, status FROM orders WHERE orders_no = #{ordersNo}
